SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwSunderScript


BEGIN OnEquip Player
	IF Player.GetEquipped 0wraithguard == 1 || Player.GetEquipped FBMWWraithguardJuryRig == 1
		Return
	ELSE
		Player.AddSpell mwMQKeeningSunderAbility

;MessageBox "Sunder has dealt you a mortal wound."
	ENDIF
END

begin OnUnequip Player
	Player.RemoveSpell mwMQKeeningSunderAbility
end


BEGIN OnAdd Player
	SET fbmwMQ13.FoundSunder TO 1

	SetStage fbmwMQ13 15
END
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
